snippet.title: Koira | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Koira, a wholesome adventure game from Studio Tolima, is out today on Steam and PlayStation 5!  

Steam: https://bit.ly/KOIRA_YTB_Steam ( 10% off until April 14! )

PlayStation 5: https://bit.ly/Koira_PS5

About the game: 

Koira is a heartwarming, hand-drawn adventure featuring a lost forest spirit and her new puppy friend. Together they must journey to safety in the heart of the enchanted forest, solving puzzles, finding friends, and avoiding the hunters lurking along the way. 

FOLLOW DONTNOD: 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@dont_nod
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dontnod_ent/ 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/DONTNOD.Entertai...
X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/DONTNOD_Ent

FOLLOW STUDIO TOLIMA:
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@studiotolima
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/studiotolima/
X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/StudioTolima
